title: VoiceTaking
description:
Imagine this: you're brainstorming, throwing ideas around, but it's all just a jumble in your head. This app is like a super-smart assistant that takes your voice notes and turns them into a clear, organized plan. It's like having a brainstorming buddy who helps you flesh out your ideas, think through the details, and even anticipate potential roadblocks 🎙️

It's not like the existing voice notes app. It comes with an AI-powered document and smart labels for automation ⚡️
